author: cmpilato
msg: All the helpers for svn_io_copy_and_translate are #if 0'd out, as is
most the code for svn_io_copy_and_translate itself (it just does a
regular copy...this way, Ben can start using the function where it counts).
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c
(translate_err): Little fixes, added docstring.
(translate_write, translate_keyword): New helper function.
(svn_io_copy_and_translate): More work on this function.  For now,
just do a regular copy and return.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/subst-test.c (verify_unexpanded_file):
Replaces verify_file, document that it verifies the test data with
keywords neither expanded nor contracted.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/subst-test.c (lines): Don't use C
string concatenation to protect the test data from keyword expansion,
it was hurting readability.  If we ever accidentally expand them,
we'll know right away because the tests will break, and then we can
revert this change.

author: sussman
msg: Oops, wrong command-line args to previous commit.  I accidentally left
out this file, and had extra gook in the log message.  Will fix
previous message.
* libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (validate_element): allow <remove-prop>
inside the <prop> area of update report response.

author: sussman
msg: More tweaks to keyword-data-retrieval.
* libsvn_ra_local/update_editor.c (send_entry_props): bugfix -- always
send date and author props; either real or NULL values.
* mod_dav_svn/update.c (close_helper): send <remove-prop> instead of a
NULL value for author and date.
* mod_dav_svn/liveprops.c (dav_svn_insert_prop): prevent Jay's
segfault: if the fs returns NULL for author or date properties, then
return a NULL value as well.  [gstein, is this correct behavior for
this routine?]
